customer.name: Somber Spirit
customer.description: A melancholic ghost who has wandered for ages, longing for warmth and solace. They seek a drink to lift their weary soul.

customer.name: Lost Spirit
customer.description: A restless soul burdened by regret. They need something soothing to help them move on.

customer.name: Wandering Spirit
customer.description: A ghost lost in time, seeking the comfort of stars to remind them of their past.

customer.name: Shadowed Specter
customer.description: A ghost shrouded in darkness, struggling to see the light. They crave something bold to break through the fog.

customer.name: Lonely Ghost
customer.description: A spirit adrift, separated from those they loved. They seek peace and comfort in a gentle drink.

customer.name: Eternal Wanderer
customer.description: A spirit caught in a never-ending journey, desperate to feel alive again. They need something sweet and revitalizing.

customer.name: Faded Spirit
customer.description: A ghost who feels disconnected from the world, longing to feel the warmth of life once more.

customer.name: Eclipsed Soul
customer.description: A soul weary from the weight of endless time, seeking a gentle and restful drink to ease their burden.

customer.name: Eternal Wraith
customer.description: A wraith who has been waiting for someone, trapped in time. They seek a drink that will bring peace and connection.

customer.name: Eternal Wraith
customer.description: A spirit who lingers in forgotten places, drawn to the faint warmth of old comforts. They seek something that feels like returning to a place they once called home.

customer.name: Moonlit Specter
customer.description: They wander beneath clouded skies, weighed by echoes of the past. In their hands, they hope to hold a drink that helps them face what still lingers in the dark.

customer.name: Glimmering Shade
customer.description: They drift along forgotten paths, clinging to faint glimmers of possibility. Something inside them yearns for a sign that it's not too late to begin again.

customer.name: Faded Echo
customer.description: Memories come and go like fog on glass—sharp one moment, then gone the next. They want something that will soften the weight of what's been lost.

customer.name: Silent Repose
customer.description: They sit at the edge of endings and beginnings, where stillness hums like a lullaby. They need something quiet to settle the ache of waiting.

customer.name: Luminous Wanderer
customer.description: Glowing faintly in the gloom, they search for something to affirm their journey. They crave a spark to remind them they are here, and they matter.

customer.name: Veiled Shadow
customer.description: They carry burdens they no longer fully understand. What they seek is a change—subtle, gentle—that lets them see old wounds in a new light.

customer.name: Shrouded One
customer.description: They speak little, their presence like a whisper in heavy fog. They’re drawn to things that feel like being seen without having to be found.

customer.name: Wandering Soul
customer.description: Their mind flits from thought to thought like wind through dry leaves. What they long for is something that helps them settle into themselves again.
